snippet.title: Mr Booms Firework Factory - An extremely hard, fast paced puzzle game for the PC - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
This is Mr Boom's firework Factory, a frustratingly difficult 3D puzzle game for PC featuring lots of explosions! Available on Steam, Itch.io, Green Man Store, GameJolt and Discord!

If you think you're up to the challenge, you should play it!

For more information please view the steam page at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1013670/Mr_Booms_Firework_Factory/ or join the discord server: https://discord.gg/brainbox

Release date: 10th July 2019

You don't have to be crazy to work here, but it helps!

Move Mr Boom's firework crates from the machines to the exit without destroying them. Beware though, as nothing is quite what it seems in the Firework Factory!

Music: Betrayed - Alexandr Zhelanov; https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov
Footage of NorkDorf's Twitch Stream used with permission; https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIWkjTKfp5bkpupR6lzRSuQ
